title: 394. Does Hollywood Still Have a Princess Problem?
description: For decades, there’s been a huge gender disparity both on-screen and behind the scenes. But it seems like cold, hard data — with an assist from the actor Geena Davis — may finally be moving the needle.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: For decades, there’s been a huge gender disparity both on-screen and behind the scenes. But it seems like cold, hard data — with an assist from the actor Geena Davis — may finally be moving the needle.
